title: Riot should change the Dominion Icon requirements for OCE
body:
**TL:DR at the bottom**
As you are all aware, Dominion is being removed with the "Dedicated Players" being rewarded with an icon.
The problem is Riot OCE is using the same requirement as the other servers despite our circumstances.
As it stands right now, players are only eligible for the icon(s?) if they have 100wins before the snapshot date.

From Dominion Launch to the Snapshot Date

NA and other severs had:
**1652 days** (Thursday, 4 August 2011 ~ Thursday, 11 February 2016),

Whereas OCE players only had(Until OCE sever arrived);
**693 days** (Thursday, 4 August 2011 ~ Thursday, 27 June 2013),

Note being, between 27/5/2013 ~ 11/2/2016 we never had a dominion queue(except one time),
Riot OCE only opened dominion queue **once**, and that was by **accident.**

It was around 2014 Jan/Feb when the OCE servers were getting DDOSed, they turned the server off and when they turned it back on, dominion queue was available for a measly 40minutes, whether any players were matches I dunno, me and my friends got booted from queue are 20minutes.

Off Topic, In a [previous post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/zOoAEj7V-will-oce-players-who-had-more-than-100-wins-on-dominion-before-transferring-still-get-the-icon?comment=000100030000), Riot Maraudaur stated that;
"The icon is intended to represent the commitment those players with **100, 500, or even a 1000+** wins invested into the map." 

Back on topic,
Riot OCE expects us to have acquired the same amount on wins in 42% of the time as other servers.
There's a major difference between distributing a reward for players that had the chance and did put in the time, compared to those who didn't have a chance at all.
This isn't fair for us OCE players. I have come up with three possible solutions but if anyone has any other solutions they should comment.

**Solution A**
Lower/Change the requirements for the icon to the following:
Assuming there are 3 icons.
Tier I Icon - Players who had at least 50 matched games(Win or Loss).
Tier II Icon - Players who had at least 50 matches games and at least 25 wins.
Tier III Icon - Players who had at least 100 matched games and at least 50wins.

This would be ideal as it scales the requirements to compensate for the lack of queue here.

**Solution B**
Open the queue temporarily(As a OCE featured game mode):
Players would be able to accumulate wins during this time, however only players whose account existed before the the arrival of the OCE server(Thursday, 27 June 2013) would qualify for the icons. (Changing the requirement to 100+ Wins and Account existing before 27/5/2013)
This also allows newer OCE players to experience proper dominion games.

**Solution C**
Allow OCE players to transfer to another server to get the remaining wins:
Riot Games may get backlash if they go this approach, however, money makes the decisions and if they do this they're getting approx $50 per icon($25 to transfer out, $25 to transfer in). New players wouldn't be able to get 100wins in the current remaining time frame.

All of these solutions are viable as they still stand with Riot's wishes to only award the dedicated players who put in the time before the snapshot date. 

TL;DR;
Riot OCE expected players to reach the same requirement as other servers in 42% of the time. They should change the requirement.

replies.body:
It isn't fair, and RIOT knows it, they just cant be fucked doing anything about it. Its just like how we are unable to get the Ranked 3v3 icons. Unless we switch server play ranked and switch back, its impossible for us to get it. But they don't care.

I personally favour Solution B. if you're going to announce limited edition content, you need a way for people to earn it. its like if they just retired DJ Sona to the 'never coming back vault' with no warning and said "if you haven't already bought it, bad luck!"

I played on the NA server for a while before OCE came out but I have no wins on dominion, it wasn't my favourite game mode, and i was still relatively new to Lol and was thought i would get better quicker if i just focused on the main game mode for now, instead of trying to learn 2 or 3 at once. As a result I have no wins on dominion and am not eligible for the icon.
I'm saying this because it shows that no matter what happens, even if RIOT lowers the requirements i wont get the Icon, so you know if i say that it is 'Unfair' to OCE players, you know that i am not saying it just because i want an icon (because i know i cant get it) so you know i speak without bias.
Love it how  there's no "option" for players who never got to try dominion to get the icon. -_-
> but we get no money out of it -rito
